# .bmad/organizational-rules.yaml
organization:
  name: Acme Corporation
  industry: FinTech
  size: 500+ employees
  locations: [USA, Israel, UK]

coding_standards:
  # Code Style
  code_style: airbnb
  linter: eslint
  formatter: prettier
  
  # Languages
  primary_languages:
    - typescript
    - python
    - go
  
  # Naming Conventions
  naming:
    files: kebab-case
    variables: camelCase
    constants: UPPER_SNAKE_CASE
    classes: PascalCase
    functions: camelCase
  
  # Code Quality
  quality:
    test_coverage_minimum: 80
    code_review_required: true
    min_reviewers: 2
    linting_required: true
    type_checking: strict

security_policies:
  # Authentication
  authentication:
    method: OAuth2 + JWT
    mfa_required: true
    session_timeout: 30  # minutes
    password_policy:
      min_length: 12
      require_uppercase: true
      require_lowercase: true
      require_numbers: true
      require_special: true
      history: 5  # can't reuse last 5 passwords
  
  # Data Protection
  data_protection:
    encryption_at_rest: required
    encryption_in_transit: required
    pii_handling: strict
    data_retention_days: 90
    gdpr_compliant: true
  
  # Code Security
  code_security:
    dependency_scanning: required
    secrets_scanning: required
    sast_scanning: required  # Static Application Security Testing
    dast_scanning: required  # Dynamic Application Security Testing
    penetration_testing: quarterly

documentation_standards:
  # Code Documentation
  code_documentation:
    inline_comments: required_for_complex_logic
    function_docs: jsdoc
    readme_required: true
    architecture_docs: required
  
  # API Documentation
  api_documentation:
    format: OpenAPI 3.0
    examples_required: true
    versioning: required
  
  # User Documentation
  user_documentation:
    format: markdown
    screenshots: required
    videos: recommended

version_control:
  # Git Workflow
  workflow: GitFlow
  main_branch: main
  develop_branch: develop
  feature_branch_prefix: feature/
  bugfix_branch_prefix: bugfix/
  release_branch_prefix: release/
  
  # Commit Standards
  commit_format: conventional_commits  # feat:, fix:, docs:, etc.
  commit_signing: required
  
  # PR Standards
  pull_requests:
    template_required: true
    description_min_length: 50
    linked_issue_required: true
    tests_required: true
    approval_required: true
    min_approvers: 2

testing_standards:
  # Test Coverage
  coverage:
    unit_tests: 80
    integration_tests: 60
    e2e_tests: critical_paths
  
  # Test Frameworks
  frameworks:
    unit: jest
    integration: jest
    e2e: playwright
  
  # Testing Requirements
  requirements:
    pre_commit: unit_tests
    pre_merge: all_tests
    pre_deploy: all_tests + manual_qa

deployment_standards:
  # Environments
  environments:
    - development
    - staging
    - production
  
  # CI/CD
  cicd:
    platform: GitHub Actions
    auto_deploy_dev: true
    auto_deploy_staging: on_merge_to_develop
    auto_deploy_prod: manual_approval
  
  # Deployment Process
  process:
    approval_required_for_prod: true
    approvers:
      - tech_lead
      - product_owner
    rollback_plan: required
    monitoring_period: 1_hour
    canary_deployment: 10_percent_first

compliance_requirements:
  # Regulations
  regulations:
    - GDPR
    - SOC2
    - PCI-DSS  # we handle payments
  
  # Audit
  audit:
    frequency: quarterly
    documentation: comprehensive
    access_logs: 1_year_retention
  
  # Privacy
  privacy:
    data_classification: required
    privacy_by_design: required
    dpia_required: for_new_features  # Data Protection Impact Assessment

communication_standards:
  # Channels
  channels:
    urgent: phone
    important: slack
    updates: email
    documentation: confluence
  
  # Meetings
  meetings:
    daily_standup: 15_minutes
    sprint_planning: 4_hours_max
    sprint_review: 2_hours_max
    retrospective: 1.5_hours_max

agent_specific_rules:
  # PM Agent
  pm:
    prd_template: '.bmad/templates/documents/prd-template.md'
    approval_workflow: required
    stakeholder_signoff: required
  
  # Architect Agent
  architect:
    adr_required: for_major_decisions  # Architecture Decision Records
    tech_stack_approval: required
    security_review: required
  
  # Dev Agent
  dev:
    code_style: '.bmad/config/eslint.json'
    test_coverage: 80
    pr_template: '.bmad/templates/pr-template.md'
  
  # Security Agent
  security:
    security_review: before_release
    pentest: quarterly
    compliance_check: required

  <step n="2">Load organizational rules from {project-root}/.bmad/organizational-rules.yaml</step>
  <step n="3">CRITICAL: Follow ALL organizational rules throughout the session</step>
  <step n="4">When in doubt, refer to organizational rules</step>
</activation>
